text.div:
Mapping from CH VACD Swissmedic code for vaccine code to CH VACD Snomed CT for vaccine code

DRAFT. Published on 2024-05-16 11:02:13+0000 by HL7 Switzerland (HL7 Switzerland: https://www.hl7.ch/, HL7 Switzerland: https://www.hl7.ch/). This artefact includes content from SNOMED Clinical Terms® (SNOMED CT®) which is copyright of the International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO). Implementers of these artefacts must have the appropriate SNOMED CT Affiliate license - for more information contact http://www.snomed.org/snomed-ct/getsnomed-ct or info@snomed.org.
